sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; import { dbService } from "fbase"; import styles from "./Carinfo.module.css" const Carinfo = () => { const location = useLocation() const ID = location.pathname.substring(9) const [cardata, setCardata] = useState([]); useEffect(()=> { dbService.collection("Car").doc(ID).get().then((doc) => { setCardata(doc.data()) }); }, []); console.log(cardata.IP) return (
  • {cardata.차량번호} / {cardata.차종}

실시간 영상

차량 파손 부위

); }; export default Carinfo;
